meta.description: Disallow literal numbers that lose precision

content.introduction:
Disallow literal numbers that lose precision

Table of ContentsRule DetailsVersionResources
This rule would disallow the use of number literals that lose precision at runtime when converted to a JSNumberdue to 64-bit floating-point rounding.
